sentences.en: 'Come, come , Mr. Barsad!'exclaimed Sydney.'Don't be ungrateful.
sentences.cn: “ 好了, 好了, 巴萨 先生, ”西德尼叫道, “ 别忘恩负义了.

sentences.en: For armchair fans back home, it was one of the highlights of the Sydney Olympics.
sentences.cn: 对于家中电视机前的体育迷来说, 这是悉尼奧运会的亮点之一.

sentences.en: He could have died after developing deep vein thrombosis during a flight to Sydney.
sentences.cn: 他在一次飞往悉尼的航行中得了深静脉血栓，险些丧命。

sentences.en: He made the crossing from Cape Town to Sydney in just over twenty-six days.
sentences.cn: 他在短短26天内从开普敦横渡到悉尼。

sentences.en: In the morning Mr McDonald departed for Sydney.
sentences.cn: 麦克唐纳先生上午启程前往悉尼。

sentences.en: It is designed on the model of the Sydney Opera House.
sentences.cn: 它是仿效悉尼歌剧院设计的。

sentences.en: It would be a crime to travel all the way to Australia and not stop in Sydney.
sentences.cn: 如果不远万里去了澳大利亚，却没在悉尼稍作停留，那真是一种罪过。

sentences.en: It's a hell of a hike from Sydney to Perth.
sentences.cn: 从悉尼到珀斯的徒步旅行简直苦死了.

sentences.en: My brother has just left Sydney for a tour of the world.
sentences.cn: 我哥哥刚离开悉尼去周游世界。

sentences.en: My brother is living in Sydney.
News Corporation was headquartered in Sydney.
sentences.cn: 新闻集团的总部设在悉尼。

sentences.en: Sydney Carton crossed the Seine again for the lighter streets.
sentences.cn: 他再度行过了塞纳河,踏入了灯光较为明亮的市街.

sentences.en: Sydney Carton paused in the street, not quite decided where to go.
sentences.cn: 西德尼-卡尔顿在街头站住了.他不知道往哪里走.

sentences.en: Sydney drank a bumper of the punch he had made , and laughed.
sentences.cn: 西德尼喝下一大杯自己调的五味酒, 笑了.

sentences.en: Sydney is afire with Olympic enthusiasm.
sentences.cn: 悉尼全城燃烧着奥林匹克的热情。

sentences.en: The ship plies between London and Sydney.
sentences.cn: 这船常航行于伦敦与悉尼之间.

sentences.en: They had told her she would be overnighting in Sydney.
sentences.cn: 他们跟她说过她将在悉尼过夜。

sentences.en: Today Mahoney booked himself into one of the best hotels in Sydney.
sentences.cn: 今天，马奥尼自己到悉尼最好的一家旅馆办理了入住手续。
